#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
using namespace::std;
int main()
{
    int n,a,b,c; short no; unsigned long count;
    cin>>no;
    while(no--)
    {
        cin>>n>>a>>b>>c; count=0;
        if(a>n) a=n;
        for(int i=0;i<=a;i++)
        for(int j=0;j<=((n-i<b)?(n-i):(b));j++)
        count+=1+((c+i+j<=n)?(c):(n-i-j));
        cout<<count<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
}
